name: HTAQuizCentre
0: ”Alexa, open h. t. a. quiz center”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: h. t. a. quiz center
des:
Key Features:
1- Explore HTA Bootcamp Quizzes: Take quizzes on any lesson from the available bootcamps on HTA to enhance your learning experience.
2- Interactive Quizzing: Engage in dynamic quizzes with multiple-choice questions.
3- Question Sets from Bootcamp: Questions are sourced directly from real bootcamp quizzes.
4- Score Tracking: Keep track of your quiz progress and receive a final score at the end of the session.

Restrictions:
1- No Personalization: The skill does not support user account profiles or personalized settings.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
